title: b7.json
text: I saw a UFO once I was a SO 9 playing in the street with a friend who's a couple of years old .and we saw a featureless silver disk hovering over the houses we watched it for a few seconds and it shocked away incredibly quickly even as a kid I got angry it was ignoring the laws of physics .we went inside to tell the grown ups and they were skeptical you'd be skeptical to rise .I got my own back a few years later one of those grown ups told me last night I saw a flying saucer I was coming up with the pub after a few drinks I stopped in NASA can explain onsite .psychologists have shown we contrast our brains to tell the truth it's easy to fool ourselves I saw something but what's more likely that I saw an alien spacecraft or that my brain misinterpreted the data my eyes were getting it .ever since I've wondered why don't .
